snippet.title: Faaast Penguin | FAAAST Trailer
snippet.description:
Play for free with cross-platform support, scheduled for release in September!

""Faaast Penguin"" is a wild and thrilling knockout action racing game where up to 40 penguins collide! Unleash attacks! Hop on ULTIMATE RIDES! Use shortcuts! Pass your rivals and reach the finish line first!

Supported Platforms: Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Epic Games Store

Additionally, an open beta test has been confirmed and pre-registration is now open! For more details, check the official website!
→ https://faaast-penguin.com/

An Epic Games account is required to play the game.
